title: breakers
body:
Cult fighting game by Visco released on Neo Geo MVS (December 17, 1996).
An update titled [b]Breakers Revenge[/b] was released on July 3, 1998. A second revision titled [b]Breakers Revenge Chicago[/b] was released on August 22, 2024.

title: jk-chan_(oouso)
body:
An [[original|original character]] by [[Oouso]].

Her main quote is "I don't want to go to school".

She has [[green eyes]], [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] with [[hair between eyes]], and [[large breasts]].

Her [[school uniform]] consists of a [[yellow cardigan]], [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], [[argyle necktie]], desaturated [[blue skirt|blue]] [[pleated skirt]], and [[black thighhighs]] and/or [[pantyhose]].

Her older sister is [[OL-chan (oouso)|]].

title: altera_the_santa_(fate)
body:
[[Fate/Grand Order]] character.

The Santa version of [[Altera (fate)|]] appearing in the [[Meikai no Merry Christmas]] event. As a result of wearing light clothing during the winter and going into the underworld, which is colder, Santa Altera has developed a fever which makes her nicer and more feminine than her Saber form, and messes with her mind to the point she thinks she's from the Ram Galaxy and not Earth.

Altera's sheep is named [[Zerco (fate)|]].

title: ereshkigal_(fate)
body:
In Mesopotamian mythology, Ereshkigal is the ruler of Irkalla, or the land of the dead. She is also [[Ishtar (fate)|]]'s sister, which is why she takes on the appearance of [[Tohsaka Rin]], [[tohsaka_rin_(true_appearance)_(fate/extra)|but with]] [[blonde hair]]. Additionally, Ereshkigal's hair becomes [[very long hair|very long]] in her Third Ascension.

[b]Character Design[/b]: [[Morii Shizuki]]
[b]Voice Actress[/b]: [[Ueda Kana]]

title: mecha_eli-chan_mk.ii_(fate)
body:
One of the two Alter Ego versions of [[Elizabeth Bathory (fate)|]], seen in the [[Halloween Strike!|third Halloween event]] of [[Fate/Grand Order]] along with [[Mecha Eli-chan (fate)|]] (Mk.I). Mk. II is completely silver in color, and speaks in a cold manner. She or Mk. I can be chosen as the welfare Servant at the end of the event, but their stats and attacks are identical.

In [[monochrome]] works, Mk. II can be distinguished by the 'II' marking on her head.

h4. Appearance

h4. See also

title: ena_(series)
body:
A surreal series by Joel G. Originally a trilogy of web shorts concerning the titular [[ENA (joel g)|]], a girl who constantly switches from a happy to sad state. She is later revealed to be a part of a larger group of ENAs, which the series then turns its attention to. 

h4. Installments 
* Web shorts (following the yellow/blue ENA): [i]Auction Day[/i], [i]Extinction Party[/i], [i]Temptation Stairway[/i], [i]Power of Potluck[/i]
* [i][[ena: dream bbq|Dream BBQ]][/i] (game following a [[ena (dream bbq) (joel g)|white/red ENA]])

title: bocchi_the_rock!
body:
An ongoing 2017-to-present [[4koma]] manga series written and illustrated by [[hamazi aki|Hamaji Aki]]. Received an anime adaptation by [[Cloverworks]] in Fall 2022. Season 2 has been announced.

The story involves [[Gotoh Hitori]] (aka Bocchi), a shy guitarist who reluctantly plays with the [[Kessoku Band]] to overcome her social anxiety.

title: ahri_(league_of_legends)
body:
A [[vastaya|vastayan]] Champion from Ionia in [[League of Legends]] usually played as an AP mid. She is a [[kyuubi|kumiho]], a fox spirit from Korean legend. title: winter_schnee
body:
A character from [[RWBY]], she is [[Weiss Schnee]]'s elder sister and a high-ranking member of the Atlesian military. She is highly professional and seen by others as cold and distant, but she has a soft side for her sister.

Like Weiss, she has [[white hair]] and [[blue eyes]], but is far taller than her sister. She shares the same Semblance as Weiss (which they both share with their mother, [[Willow Schnee]]), being able to create glyphs and summon ice-based constructs of creatures she has defeated.

Voiced by [[Elizabeth Maxwell]].
other_names: ウィンター・シュニー

title: pluto_batou
body:
Pluto Batou was the captain of the 2nd Division of the Harusame pirates. Known as the best swordsman in Harusame with the title "The Star Sword King," he was said to be able to rival Kamui with a sword in his hand. He is also responsible for giving Tatsuma the injury that permanently ended his ability to fight with a sword
Character of [[Gintama]]. [[Red hair]], one eye on forehead
He  is voiced by [[Seki Tomokazu]].

title: tsurugi_(blue_archive)
body:
A character from [[Blue Archive]]. President of the [[Justice Task Force (blue archive)|]]. Her full name is Kenzaki Tsurugi.

She [[dual wielding|dual wields]] a pair of modified [[Winchester Model 1887]] [[shotgun]]s. Her most notable characteristic is her inability to control her facial expression. While she is actually a timid and shy person, she is often seen with [[evil smile|evil]], [[yandere]], or [[crazy smile]], at times borderlining [[rape face]].

Voiced by: [[Kobayashi Yuu]]
Original artist: [[mx2j]]

title: may_(pokemon)
body:
[b]May[/b], known as [b]Haruka[/b] (ハルカ) in Japan, is the female player character in [i][[pokemon|Pokémon]] [[pokemon rse|Ruby, Sapphire,]] and [[Pokemon Emerald|Emerald]][/i].

May is a cheerful girl and the daughter of Professor Birch from the Hoenn region. She's great at taking care of others and loves cute Pokémon and conducting fieldwork [tn](official bio)[/tn].

In her [[pokemon oras|ORAS]] outfit, she has [[grey eyes]] and [[medium hair|medium-length]] [[brown hair]]. She wears an [[orange hairband|orange]] [[bow hairband|hairband]], a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[orange shirt|shirt]], a [[bracelet]], [[bike shorts]] [[bike shorts under shorts|under]] [[white shorts|white]] [[short shorts|shorts]], [[yellow footwear|yellow]] [[shoes]], and a [[green bag|green]] [[fanny pack|belt bag]].

Her [[Pokemon Adventures]] counterpart is [b]Sapphire[/b] who has [[fangs]], [[sharp nails]] and sports on occasion a [[leaf bikini]] and [[grass skirt]], but mostly during fieldwork.
h4. Official Art

title: oda_nobunaga_(maou_avenger)_(fate)
body:
An older aspect of the Avenger-class [[Oda Nobunaga (fate)|]] that appears in [i][[Fate/Grand Order]][/i], presented as the Nobunaga that became powerful enough to live as the "Devil King of the Sixth Heaven". She is the third ascension of the collective, succeeding Nobunaga as well as  [[oda kippoushi (fate)|a male incarnation in his "Kippoushi" years]].

Unlike most incarnations of Nobunaga, she has [[red hair]]. While she retains the [[red cape]], [[Oda uri]], and [[armored boots]] of her younger self, this Nobunaga instead wears a black [[bodysuit]]. Her [[red eyes]] are still present.

h4. Appearance
* !post #6585946
* !post #6721180: Dream Portrait

title: oda_kippoushi_(fate)
body:
A male aspect of the Avenger-class [[oda_nobunaga_(fate)|Oda Nobunaga]] that appears in [i][[Fate/Grand Order]][/i], intended to represent the "Great Fool of Owari" era of the daimyo's life. This aspect is referred to by Nobunaga's birthname, "Kippoushi", as it is the name he was known under during the time he was active. He appears as the collective's second ascension, following regular Nobunaga and preceding [[oda nobunaga (maou avenger) (fate)|her older "Demon King" self]].

He retains the [[red eyes]] and [[black hair]] of his counterparts, as well as their black [[peaked cap]] and [[Oda uri]]. Unlike the other two forms, this Nobunaga wears a green [[crop top]] with a [[single sleeve]] and armorless [[black footwear|black]] [[boots]]. Also exclusive to this form is a long, messy [[ponytail]].

h4. Appearance
* !post #6585941
* !post #9038537: Sengoku Freestyle

title: hilda_(arknights)
body:
A character from [[Arknights]]. 
She first appears in Episode 15 and [spoilers]she is a follower of  [[Priestess (Arknights)|]][/spoilers]. 
[spoilers]She previously contracted Oripathy and succumbed to it. After that Hilda got taken in by [[Priestess (Arknights)|]] and got revived/"restored" by her.[/spoilers]
She is a brunette Cautus and appears alongside [spoilers][[Priestess (Arknights)|]][/spoilers] wearing a white hooded dress-like outfit.

title: official_alternate_costume
body:
[[Alternate costume]]s of official origin, whether it be from the creators themselves, or from second-parties involved in the given copyright. Generally a costume other than the standard one the character appears in.

These can often times appear in manga/anime (beach episodes, as one example), video games (whether as unlockables or as skins to be bought in gacha games), and on special events. Figures which can have such costumes include [[Virtual YouTuber]]s.

[b]Only[/b] use this tag for official costumes of the wearer themselves. If the character is wearing an official costume belonging to another character, use [[alternate costume]] or [[cosplay]] instead as applicable.

[b]Do not[/b] use this tag with [[alternate costume]], the tags are mutually exclusive.

h4. See also

* [[official alternate hairstyle]]
** [[official alternate hair length]]

Don't add this tag just because thighs are visible. The actual size must be large to use this tag. In general, be careful if you have a character with either a very [[fat]] waist that doesn't require the thighs to be very thick, or a very [[skinny|thin]] waist that requires the thighs to be very thick, if each thigh is about the same size as the character's waist.

title: reverse_slavery_(meme)
body:
A [[meme]] originating in a photo depicting 3 White workers in a cotton field from behind, while a Black man holds a whip as if about to beat them. Often also showing a smiling fading face in the sky above.

* "Know Your Meme: Reverse slavery":[https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/reverse-slavery]

title: transformers:_war_for_cybertron_trilogy
body:
A [[Transformers]] series consisting of a toyline and accompanying Netflix series. The series features designs heavily based on the characters' G1 appearances. It is divided into three parts as follows:

* [i]Siege[/i] - 2019 toyline and 2020 Netflix series following the war on Cybertron.
* [i]Earthrise[/i] - 2020 toyline and Netflix series following the war as it moves to Earth.
* [i]Kingdom[/i] - 2021 toyline and Netflix series, incorporating characters from [i][[Beast Wars]][/i].

Not to be confused with the [[Transformers: War for Cybertron|video game]] of the same name.

title: roosterteeth
body:
An American web video production company, famous for [[RWBY]] and [[Red vs Blue|Red vs. Blue]]. From 2014 to 2022, Roosterteeth went from being independently run to finding itself steadily under the ownership of AT&T, before ending up at its final parent company,  [[Warner bros|Warner Bros. Discovery]].

Roosterteeth was shut down by its parent company in 2024. On February 5, 2025, the Roosterteeth brand was bought by former co-founder Burnie Burns under his independent company, Box Canyon Productions. However, some former properties like RWBY will not return due to being sold to other companies or having gone independent.

h4. Works
* [[Camp Camp]]
* [[Gen Lock|gen:LOCK]]
* [[Red vs Blue|Red vs. Blue]]
* [[RWBY]]
* [[Death Battle]]
* [[Transformers: War for Cybertron Trilogy]]

h4.External links
* "Official website":https://roosterteeth.com/
other_names: ルースター・ティース

title: yuki_judai
body:
AKA: Jaden Yuki (English dub)

Main protagonist from [[Yu-Gi-Oh! GX]], as well as the reincarnation of the [[Supreme King (yu-gi-oh! Gx)|]]. He is headstrong, optimistic, fun loving, and a talented Duelist who loves Dueling as much as he cares for his friends. At the end of the third season, he fused his soul with [[Yubel]], his childhood ace card, with [[Super Polymerization]] to become a Duel Monster-Human hybrid.

Attends the Duel Academy in the Slifer Red Dorm, and uses a deck composed of Elemental Hero with [[Elemental Hero Neos]] as his ace card, and [[Winged Kuriboh]] as his Duel Monster spirit partner.

h4. See also
* [[Supreme King (Yu-Gi-Oh! GX)|]]

title: kamen_rider_black
body:
The protagonist of the [[Kamen Rider BLACK (series)|eighth]] [[Kamen Rider]] television series.

After suffering a body-altering surgery and barely escaping, Kotaro Minami becomes Kamen Rider Black to begin his battle against the forces of Golgom and save his adopted brother.

As his name suggests, Black is mostly black in color with yellow and red accents. Like [[Kamen Rider 1|No. 1]] and [[Kamen Rider 2|No. 2]], his design is based on a grasshopper.

He eventually got upgraded in the [[Kamen Rider BLACK RX (Series)|next series]] as [[Kamen Rider BLACK RX|BLACK RX]].

h4. See also
* [[Kamen Rider Black Sun]]

body:
An image whose subject is directly facing the viewer at a 0° angle. Their head, torso and hips (when visible) should all be directly facing the viewer and not turned to the side.

The subject can be leaning forward/back, have their arms in the air, or even be upside-down; as long as they are not turned to the side at all, then this tag applies.

title: hang_in_there_(meme)
body: A classic motivational [[poster]], often found in workplaces making an attempt to seem whimsical. It takes many forms, but customarily depicts a [[kitten]] or [[puppy]] in a precarious position, such as hanging from a rope, tree branch, or window ledge, with the slogan HANG IN THERE. (Some versions have longer variants of the slogan, such as HANG IN THERE, BABY, FRIDAY'S COMING.)

title: ena_(joel_g)
body: ENA is the titular protagonist of the [[ena (series)|ENA animated series]]. She is voiced by both Gabe V. and [[Lizzie Freeman]] in her regular state, while Sam Meza voices her in her drunk state. The ENA series was created by [[Joel G]] to the social media [[Newgrounds]].

title: kitasato_shibasaburou
body:
Kitazato signed his name "Kitasato" using "sa," which is pronounced "za" in German, in order to be called "Kitazato" in Germany, where he was studying. That signature was read as "きたさと" in English-speaking countries.

h4. External links
* "Wikipedia (EN)":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kitasato_Shibasaburō
* "Wikipedia (JP)":https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/北里柴三郎
other_names: きたざとしばさぶろう

title: karenina_(pgr)
body:
A playable character of [[Punishing: Gray Raven]], part of the Babylonia Engineering force, frequently works together with various other departments/task forces of Babylonia, often referred to just as Karen. Voiced by [[Tomatsu Haruka]].

Karenina has a consistent depiction across her playable frames, all featuring [[white hair|white/platinum blonde hair]] though of various length and style, [[medium breasts]] and [[yellow eyes]]. Uses a heavy [[cannon]] as her weapon, while her Scire frame uses a large [[hammer]] instead.

title: kaibara_elena_(cookie)
body:
* !asset #21049544
* !asset #21049553

Voice of [[Moriya Suwako]] and [[Yasaka Kanako]] in [[cookie (touhou)|Training with Sanae]]. Unlike the other VAs in Cookie, Elena is a professional who appeared in everything from Pokemon and Precure to eroge. This led to her being referred to as a god, compared to the amateurs that usually voice in Cookie. Her "god" status put her in competition with [[Go (inmu)|]], the god of [[Manatsu No Yo No Inmu]], and [[Alison (alison_airlines) (character)|]], the god of dreams. She became associated with [[Cthulhu Mythos]]-esque gods, compared to Go's Greek god representation. The phrase "SWK IS GOD" began to be used whenever she appeared, often with the emoji +⌒o⌒+. 

h4. Works
* [[Ojamajo Doremi]]: [[Kotake Tetsuya]]
* [[Kimi ga Aruji de Shitsuji ga Ore de]]: [[Venis]]
* [[Maji de Watashi ni Koi Shinasai!]]: [[Shiina Miyako]]
* [[Heartcatch Precure!]]: [[Kurumi Sakura]]
* [[Futari wa Precure Splash Star]]: [[Shinohara Mariko]]
* [[Soukou Akki Muramasa]]: [[Ayane Ichijou]]
* [[Soko ni Umi ga Atte]]: [[Ogata Yuunagi]]
* [[Tsuyokiss]]: [[Yashi Nagomi]] 
* [[Saya no Uta]]: [[Takahata Oumi]] 

h4. See Also

title: star_emperor_(ragnarok_online)
body:
3rd job of the Star Gladiator class tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Usually don't have any weapons other than their [[clenched hands|fists]]. 

Males wear an [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]] [[open shirt|open]] [[white shirt]] [[print shirt|with]] a [[cloud print]], [[brown pants]], a [[brown belt]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[fold-over boots]].
Females wear a [[short sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[white shirt]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[brown gloves]], [[brown shorts]], [[brown socks]], and [[white footwear|white]] [[boots]].
* !post #7301462
* !post #7301465

title: soul_reaper_(ragnarok_online)
body:
3rd job of the Soul Linker class tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Can equip a wide variety of weapons, including [[staff]]s, [[knife|knives]], and their own [[clenched hands|fists]].

Males wear an [[open coat|open]] [[black coat]] over a [[red vest]] and [[black shirt]], [[black gloves|black]] [[fingerless gloves]] with [[bead bracelet]]s, a [[championship belt]], [[black pants]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]].
Females wear a [[black shirt]] with [[hip vent]]s and [[short over long sleeves|additional]] [[white sleeves]], a [[black skirt]] with [[tassel]]s, [[black thighhighs]] with [[garter straps]], [[bead bracelet]]s, and [[white footwear|white]] [[shoes]].
* !post #7301467
* !post #7301475

title: star_gladiator_(ragnarok_online)
body:
One of the possible 2nd jobs of the [[Taekwon (ragnarok online)|]] in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Usually don't have any weapons other than their [[clenched hands|fists]]. Localized as Taekwon Master on the international servers. 

Males wear a [[dougi]] of a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]]  [[white shirt]] and [[white pants]], [[wrist guards]], and a [[black belt]], going [[barefoot]].
Females wear a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]]  [[white shirt]], a [[black belt]], a [[black skirt]], [[black socks]] with [[shin guards]], and [[red footwear|red]] [[shoes]].
* !post #7298161
* !post #7298164

title: rebellion_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The next job of [[Gunslinger (Ragnarok Online)|]] class line in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Can be equipped with a variety of [[holding gun|guns]] but most commonly seen [[dual wielding]] [[handgun]]s. Named characters: [[Lucky (ragnarok online)|]], [[Est Loveroy]], [[Elena Bolkova]].

Both males and females wear the same [[military uniform]] consisting of a [[double-breasted]] [[black coat]] with a [[gold trim]], [[epaulettes]] with [[chain]]s attached, a [[brown belt|brown]] [[bandolier]] belt with an [[emblem]], and [[white pants]] [[pants tucked in|tucked into]] [[black footwear|black]] [[cross-laced footwear|cross-laced]] [[boots]].
* !post #7301427
* !post #7301438

title: oboro_(ragnarok_online)
body:
One of the possible 2nd jobs of the [[Ninja (ragnarok online)|]] in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Only females can become Oboros. Usually are equipped with [[holding dagger|dagger]]s.

Females wear a [[short kimono|short]] [[white kimono]], [[vambraces]] with [[tassel]]s, [[black gloves]], a [[large bow|large]] [[pink bow]] on their [[back bow|backs]], [[fishnet pantyhose]], [[toeless legwear|toeless]] [[black socks]], [[shin guards]], and [[high heels]].
* !post #7301426

title: kagerou_(ragnarok_online)
body:
One of the possible 2nd jobs of the [[Ninja (ragnarok online)|]] in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Only males can become Kagerous. Usually are equipped with [[holding dagger|dagger]]s.

Males wear an [[open coat|open]] [[sleeveless coat|sleeveless]] [[white coat]], [[kote]], an [[open shirt|open]] [[black shirt]], [[black pants|black]] [[hakama pants]], [[shin guards]], and [[zouri]].
* !post #7301422

title: soul_linker_(ragnarok_online)
body:
One of the possible 2nd jobs of the [[Taekwon (ragnarok online)|]] in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Usually are equipped with [[holding staff|staff]]s or [[holding books|book]]. 

Males wear a [[hanbok]] of a [[white shirt]] with  [[long sleeves|long]] [[wide sleeves]], [[brown pants]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]].
Females wear a [[hanbok]] of a light [[brown shirt]] with [[long sleeves]], a [[brown skirt]] with a [[pelvic curtain]], and [[white footwear|white]] [[shoes]]. 
* !post #7298168
* !post #7298172

title: summoner_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The only job available to the Doram race of [[Ragnarok Online]], oftentimes just shortened to Doram or [[Cat ears|Cat]]. Depending on their artist, the Dorams can appear as [[Furry male|fur]][[Furry female|ries]] or mostly human with a small snout. They can eventually upgrade to a [[Spirit Handler (ragnarok online)|]].

[[Cat boy|Males]] wear a [[brown capelet]] with a [[brown shirt]] and [[brown pants]], with a [[brown belt]] and [[vambraces]], going [[barefoot]]. Their [[cat tail|tail]] usually has [[tail armor]].
[[Cat Girl|Females]] wear a [[purple capelet]] with a [[red bowtie]], an [[orange dress]], and [[vambraces]] going [[barefoot]] as well. Their [[cat tail|tail]] usually has a [[red bow|red]] [[tail bow]].

h4. Appearance
* !post #7301444
* !post #7301445

title: super_novice_(ragnarok_online)
body:
An expanded job in [[Ragnarok Online]]. An additional quest brings them on par with 3rd classes as an Expanded Super Novice, but leaves their appearance the same. Can equip nearly every weapon in the game, but commonly use [[holding sword|swords]] and [[holding dagger|daggers]].

Males wear a [[white shirt|white]] [[two-tone shirt|and]] [[blue shirt|blue]] [[turtleneck shirt]] with [[sleeveless shirt|no sleeves]] and a [[cross print]], [[brown gloves]], [[brown shorts]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[boots]].
Females wear nearly the same outfit, but with [[fingerless gloves]], [[short shorts]], and [[blue socks]].
* !post #7294230
* !post #7294232

title: gunslinger_(ragnarok_online)
body:
An expanded job in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Can be equipped with a variety of [[holding gun|guns]] but most commonly seen [[dual wielding]] [[handgun]]s.

Males wear a [[brown coat]] with [[long sleeves|long]] [[fur-trimmed sleeves]], [[black gloves]], [[brown pants]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]].
Females wear an [[open jacket|open]] [[brown jacket]] with [[long sleeves|long]] [[fur-trimmed sleeves]], a [[crop top|cropped]] [[brown tank top]], [[black gloves]], [[brown pants]], and [[white footwear|white]] [[boots]].
* !post #7298192
* !post #7298194

title: ninja_(ragnarok_online)
body:
An expanded job in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Usually are equipped with a [[holding dagger|dagger]].

Males wear a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[black shirt]], [[arm wrap]]s, [[vambraces]], a [[brown sash|brown]] [[obi]] with a [[crescent]] [[obijime]], [[baggy pants|baggy]] [[blue pants]], and [[zouri]].

Females wear a [[short dress|short]] [[sleeveless dress|sleeveless]] [[blue dress]], [[vambraces]], a [[brown sash|brown]] [[obi]] with a [[crescent]] [[obijime]], [[black thighhighs]], and [[zouri]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #7298179
* !post #7298187

title: taekwon_(ragnarok_online)
body:
An expanded job in [[Ragnarok Online]], localized as Taekwon Kid on the international server. Usually don't have any weapons other than their [[clenched hands|fists]] or maybe [[brass knuckles]]. 

Males wear a [[dougi]] of a [[white shirt]] and [[white pants]], a [[black bowtie]], [[arm wrap]]s, and [[foot wraps]], going [[barefoot]].
Females wear a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[blue shirt]] with a [[hip vent]], [[arm wrap]]s, [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[red gloves]], a [[red skirt]], [[shin guards]], [[white footwear|white]] [[sandals]].

h4. Appearance
* !post #7298156
* !post #7298160

title: sura_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Monk (ragnarok online)|]]/[[Champion (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]], sometimes mistranslated as Shura. Mostly fight with their [[clenched hands|fists]] or [[prayer beads]]. 

h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301345
* !post #7301358
Males wear a [[Cross of Prontera]] [[cross necklace|necklace]], [[topless male|no shirt]] on their chest but a [[white shirt]] [[shirt around waist|around their waist]], [[gauntlets]] over [[black gloves]], [[white pants]] with a [[flame print]], a [[black belt|black]] [[championship belt]], and [[barefoot|no shoes]]. 
Females wear a similar outfit but with a [[chest sarashi]], [[black pants]], and [[foot wraps]]. 


h4. [[Official alternate costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306180
* !post #7306183
Males now wear an [[arm wrap]] instead of gauntlets and the shirt is now worn normally, but the rest is the same as the original. 
The female costume is similar too, but the [[white shirt|shirt]] is now [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] and they have [[black shorts]].

title: shadow_chaser_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Rogue (ragnarok online)|]]/[[Stalker (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Usually have a [[holding dagger|dagger]] of some kind with an [[sheath]] but can also use [[holding bow (weapon)|bows]]. 


h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301383
* !post #7301395
Males wear a [[fur collar]] over a [[shrug (clothing)|]], a [[smiley face]] on a [[chain]], a [[brown cape|brown]] [[waist cape]], [[fur-trimmed pants|fur-trimmed]] [[brown pants]] with a [[leopard print]], [[black footwear|black]] [[shoes]]. 
Females wear a [[cross-laced top|cross-laced]] [[brown coat]] and a [[fur-trimmed coat|fur trim]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[brown gloves|brown]] [[elbow gloves]] also with [[cross-laced gloves|cross-lacing]], a [[brown skirt|brown]] [[miniskirt]], [[lace-trimmed legwear|lace-trimmed]] [[grey thighhighs]], and [[grey footwear|grey]] [[high heels]]. 


h4. [[Official alternate costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306189
* !post #7306191
Males wear a [[fur collar]] on a [[brown cape|brown]] [[fur cape]], a [[chain necklace]], a [[black shirt|black]] [[crop top]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[black gloves]], a [[torn cape|torn]] [[black cape|black]] [[waist cape]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]]. 
Females wear a [[open coat|open]] [[brown coat|brown]] [[fur coat]], a [[red sports bra]], [[fur-trimmed sleeves|fur-trimmed]] [[red sleeves|red]] [[detached sleeves|sleeves]], [[fur-trimmed skirt|fur-trimmed]] [[red skirt|red]] [[miniskirt]], a [[fishnet thighhighs]], [[spiked anklet]]s, and [[black footwear|black]] [[high heels]].

title: genetic_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Alchemist (ragnarok online)|]]/[[Creator (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Usually are seen equipped with [[holding axe|axes]] or [[holding staff|staffs]]. Often accompanied by their homunculi: [[Eira (ragnarok online)|]], [[Bayeri (ragnarok online)|]], [[Sera (ragnarok online)|]], [[Dieter (ragnarok online)|]], [[Eleanor (ragnarok online)|]]


h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301411
* !post #7301414
Males wear a [[mouth mask]], [[living clothes|living]] [[pauldrons]], a kind of cropped [[breastplate]] showing [[midriff]], [[white gloves]] with [[vial]]s and [[syringe]]s, [[white pants]] with [[round-bottom flask]]s, and [[white footwear|white]] [[shoes]]. 
Females wear a the same [[pauldrons]], [[vambraces]], a [[brown bikini]] [[bikini top only|top]] with [[teeth]], a [[brown skirt|brown]] [[miniskirt]], [[brown thighhighs]], and [[white footwear|white]] [[boots]]. 


h4. [[Official alternate costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306203
* !post #7306205
Males and females wear nearly the same outfit of a [[white jacket|white]] [[blazer]], a [[collared shirt|collared]] [[blue shirt|blue]]/[[red shirt]], a [[two-sided cape|two-sided]] [[brown cape|brown]] and [[blue cape|blue]]/[[red cape]], a [[black necktie]], a [[black belt]], and then either [[brown pants]] with [[white footwear|white]] [[shoes]] or a [[brown skirt|brown]] [[miniskirt]] with [[red thighhighs]] and [[white footwear|white]] [[cross-laced footwear|cross-laced]] [[high heel boots]].

title: wanderer_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Dancer (ragnarok online)|]]/[[Gypsy (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Only females can become Wanderers. Can be equipped with [[holding bow (weapon)|bows]], but more commonly are seen with a [[holding whip|whip]]. 

h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301305
They wear a [[mismatched bikini]] with a [[white bikini|white]] top and a [[feather trim|feather-trimmed]] [[red bikini|red]] bottom, [[feathered wings|feathered]] [[white wings]], a [[bracer]] with [[bangle]]s over it, a [[large bow|large]] [[red bow]] on their [[back bow|back]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[sandals]]. 

h4. [[Official alternate costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306172
They wear a [[red choker]] with a [[blue gemstone]], a [[frilled dress|frilled]] [[sleeveless dress|sleeveless]] [[white dress]] fastened with a [[red corset]], [[wide sleeves|wide]] [[white sleeves|white]] [[detached sleeves]] also with [[frilled sleeves|frills]], the same back [[bow]], [[white socks|white]] [[kneehighs]], and [[red footwear|red]] [[high heels]].

title: minstrel_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Bard (ragnarok online)|]]/[[Clown (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]], localized as Maestro on the international server as Minstrel was the localized version of the Clown. Only males can become Minstrels. Can be equipped with [[holding bow (weapon)|bows]], but more commonly are seen with various [[holding instrument|instruments]] such as [[lute (instrument)|]]s or [[guitar]]s. 

h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301298
They wear a [[striped scarf|striped]] [[black scarf|black]] and [[white scarf]], a [[red scarf|red]] [[striped scarf]], a [[blue scarf|blue]] [[polka dot scarf]], an [[argyle coat|argyle]] [[red coat]], a [[black vest]] over a [[white shirt]] with [[juliet sleeves]], [[baggy pants|baggy]] [[black pants]], and [[grey footwear|grey]] [[boots]].

h4. [[Official alternate costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306169
They wear a [[two-sided cape|two-sided]] [[black cape|black]] and [[red cape]], a [[red coat]] with a [[gold trim]], a [[white ascot]], a [[red vest]] over a [[white shirt]], [[white gloves]], [[baggy pants|baggy]] [[black pants]], [[white socks]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[shoes]].

title: sorcerer_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Sage (ragnarok online)|]]/[[Professor (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Can equip a [[holding staff|staff]] or a [[holding book|book]]. Often accompanied by their elemental spirits: [[Agni (ragnarok online)|]], [[Aqua (ragnarok online)|]], [[Ventus (ragnarok online)|]], [[Tera (ragnarok online)|]].

h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301287
* !post #7301291
Males wear a large [[fur collar]] over a [[white shirt|white]] [[argyle shirt]], [[white sleeves|white]] [[detached sleeves|sleeves]] fastened with a [[bangle]], a [[white cape|white]] [[argyle cape|argyle]] [[waist cape]], [[black pants|black]] [[argyle pants]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[shoes]].
Females wear the same collar over a [[sleeveless dress|sleeveless]] semi-[[see-through dress|transparent]] [[argyle dress|argyle]] [[white dress]] with a [[side slit]], [[white sleeves|white]] [[detached sleeves|sleeves]] fastened with a [[bangle]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[sandals]].


h4. [[Official alternate costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306160
* !post #7306161
Males wear a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[red shirt]] with a [[gold trim]] over an absurdly long [[white coat]] with a [[pelvic curtain]], a [[fur collar]], [[detached sleeves|detached]] [[white sleeves|white]] [[two-tone sleeves|and]] [[red sleeves]], [[black pants]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[shoes]].
Females wear a [[long dress|long]] [[layered dress|layered]] [[red dress|red]] and [[white dress]] with a [[gold trim]] and [[juliet sleeves]], a [[fur collar]], a [[pelvic curtain]], an [[anklet]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[high heels]].

title: royal_guard_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Crusader (ragnarok online)|]]/[[Paladin (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Can use [[holding polearm|polearms]] like [[spear]]s and [[lance]]s or [[holding sword|swords]], but almost always have a [[holding shield|shield]]. Sometimes seen [[riding]] a [[Gryphon (ragnarok online)|]].

h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301203
* !post #7301259
Males wear a [[breastplate]] over [[chainmail]], [[pauldrons]] with the [[Cross of Prontera]], [[gauntlets]], [[faulds]], [[black pants]] under [[leg armor]], and [[armored boots]].
Females wear [[bikini armor]] with [[pauldrons]], a [[Cross of Prontera]] [[cross necklace|necklace]], [[gauntlets]], [[black thighhighs]], and [[armored boots|armored]] [[high heel boots]].


h4. [[Official Alternate Costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306151
* !post #7306153
Males wear a [[breastplate]], [[pauldrons]], a [[blue cape]], a [[brown belt]], [[faulds]], [[leg armor]], and [[armored boots]]. 
Females wear an [[armored dress]] consisting of a [[shrug (clothing)|]] and a [[pink skirt]], [[pauldrons]], [[gauntlets]], [[faulds]], and [[armored boots]].

title: arch_bishop_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Priest (ragnarok online)|]]/[[High Priest (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Can use a [[holding mace|mace]], [[holding book|book]], or [[holding staff|staff]]. 


h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301320
* !post #7301341
Males wear a [[black choker]] [[cross choker|with]] the [[Cross of Prontera]], a [[cropped jacket|cropped]] [[white jacket]] over a [[blue coat]] with [[long sleeves]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[black gloves]], a [[cross necklace]], [[white pants]], and [[black footwear|black]]-[[two-tone footwear]]-[[white footwear|white]] [[shoes]]. 
Females wear a [[blue dress|blue]]-[[two-tone dress|and]]-[[white dress]] with a [[cleavage]] [[cleavage cutout|cutout]] and [[juliet sleeves]], [[cross]]es on the shoulders and chest, a [[yellow sash]], [[white thighhighs|white]] [[fishnet thighhighs]] with [[frilled thighhighs|frills]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[high heels]]. 


h4. [[Official alternate costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306175
* !post #7306176
Males wear a similar outfit to their original costume, but a [[white capelet]], a [[gold trim|gold-trimmed]] [[black shirt]], and the coat now [[open coat|open]].
Females also wear a close outfit, but now their [[frilled dress|dress]] is [[frilled sleeves|frilled]] with [[yellow bow|yellow]] [[dress bow]]s,

title: guillotine_cross_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Assassin (ragnarok online)|]]/[[Assassin Cross (ragnarok online)|]]/tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Always have a [[holding dagger|dagger]] of some kind, usually a [[jamadhar]] alongside their [[arm blade]]s. Named characters: [[Loki (ragnarok online)|]], [[Verkhasel]], [[Zeith (ragnarok online)|]], [[Alp Ocart]].


h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301375
* !post #7301380
Males wear a [[black bodysuit]], [[red armor|red]] [[pauldrons]] and [[gauntlets]], a [[torn cape|torn]] [[red cape|red]] [[waist cape]], [[leg armor]], and [[armored boots]]. 
Females wear a [[shrug (clothing)|]], [[red armor|red]] [[bikini armor]], [[black socks|black]] [[kneehighs]], and [[armored boots]]. 


h4. [[Official alternate costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306185
* !post #7306187
Males wear a [[torn scarf|torn]] [[red scarf]], a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[black shirt]], [[black gloves|black]] [[elbow gloves]], [[red armor|red]] [[gauntlets]], a [[torn cape|torn]] [[black cape|black]] [[waist cape]], [[black pants]], and [[armored boots]]. 
Females wear a similar outfit but a [[black leotard]] instead of a shirt and [[black thighhighs]] instead of pants.

title: mechanic_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Blacksmith (ragnarok online)|]] / [[Whitesmith (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Usually are equipped with [[holding axe|axes]], [[holding hammer|hammers]], or [[holding wrench|wrenches]]. They can ride in a [[mecha]] too. 


h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301404
* !post #7301408
Males wear a [[shrug (clothing)|]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[black gloves|black]] [[elbow gloves]], [[red armor|red]] [[pauldrons]] and [[vambraces]], a [[chain necklace]], a [[grey jumpsuit]] [[jumpsuit around waist|around the waist]], [[black pants]], and [[armored boots]]. 
Females wear a [[black bikini]] [[bikini top only|top]] with a [[o-ring top|o-ring]], [[yellow armor|yellow]] [[vambraces]] over [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]]  [[black gloves|black]] [[elbow gloves]], a [[white jumpsuit]] [[jumpsuit around waist|around the waist]], and [[armored boots|armored]] [[high heel boots]]. 


h4. [[Official alternate costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306192
* !post #7306199
Males wear a [[brown shirt]] under an [[open jumpsuit|open]] [[black jumpsuit]] with [[long sleeves]], [[black gloves]], a [[white belt]] with a [[belt pouch]], and [[armored boots]].
Females wear an [[open jumpsuit|open]] [[white jumpsuit]] with [[long sleeves]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[black gloves]], [[black socks]], and [[armored boots|armored]] [[high heel boots]].

title: ranger_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Hunter (ragnarok online)|]]/[[Sniper (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Always have a [[holding bow (weapon)|bow]] and [[arrow (projectile)|arrows]], usually in a [[quiver]]. Can be accompanied by a [[wolf]] or [[hawk]]. 

h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301293
* !post #7301296
Males wear a [[camouflage scarf|camouflage]] [[green scarf]], a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[green shirt|green]] [[crop top]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[brown gloves]], a [[brown belt]] with a [[belt pouch]], [[camouflage shorts|camouflage]] [[green shorts]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[boots]].
Females wear a fairly similar costume, but with a [[green tube top]] with [[bra strap]]s instead of a shirt, [[green gloves]] instead of brown, and occasionally [[green thighhighs]].


h4. [[Official alternate costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306164
* !post #7306168
Males wear a [[yellow scarf]], a [[green vest]] over a [[short sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[white shirt]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[black gloves]], a [[brown belt]], [[brown pants]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[boots]].
Females wear the same [[scarf]], [[gloves]], and [[boots]], but with a [[green corset]], [[white sleeves|white]] [[detached sleeves]], [[black shorts|black]] [[short shorts]], and a [[white skirt]].

title: warlock_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Wizard (ragnarok online)|]]/[[High Wizard (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Can equip a [[holding staff|staff]] or a [[holding wand|wand]], but sometimes are seen with a [[holding book|book]]. 

h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301264
* !post #7301281
Males wear an [[open coat|open]] [[grey coat]] over a [[black bodysuit]] which itself is over a [[white shirt]] and [[black pants]], [[black gloves]] with [[chain]]s attached, and [[black footwear|black]] [[shoes]]. 
Females wear a similar outfit but instead of a bodysuit, they wear a [[crop top|cropped]] [[white shirt]], [[suspenders]] on their [[pants]] with a [[front slit]], [[white thighhighs]], and [[yellow footwear|yellow]] [[high heels]].


h4. [[Official alternate costume|Second Costume]]
* !post #7306155
* !post #7306157
Males wear a [[brown cape|brown]] [[two-sided cape|and]] [[red cape|red]] [[fur-trimmed cape]], a [[black shirt|black]] [[two-tone shirt|and]] [[white shirt]] with [[gold trim|gold-trimmed]] [[long sleeves|sleeves]], [[black gloves]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[two-tone footwear|and]] [[white footwear|white]] [[shoes]].
Females wear a [[black cape|black]] [[two-sided cape|and]] [[red cape|red]] [[fur-trimmed cape]], a [[short dress|short]] [[black dress|black]] [[two-tone dress|and]] [[white dress]] with a [[fur-trimmed dress|fur trim]], [[black gloves]], [[black thighhighs|black]] [[two-tone legwear|and]] [[white thighhighs]] with [[garter straps]], and [[yellow footwear|yellow]] [[sandals]].

title: rune_knight_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The Third Job of the [[Knight (ragnarok online)|]]/[[Lord Knight (ragnarok online)|]] tree in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Mostly use [[holding sword|swords]] but can use other weapons. Often [[riding dragon|riding]] a [[Ferus (ragnarok online)|]]. There is one more prototype design that was rumored to be added to the game, but it never was fully released.

h4. Original Appearance
* !post #7301172
* !post #7301177
Males wear a [[breastplate]] over [[chainmail]], [[spiked pauldrons]], a [[torn cape|torn]] [[red cape]], [[spiked gauntlets]], a [[red tabard]], a [[brown belt]] fastened with the [[Cross of Prontera]], [[leg armor]], and [[armored boots]].
Females wear a [[bikini armor]], [[spiked pauldrons]], [[vambraces]] over [[black gloves]], the [[torn cape|same]] [[red cape|cape]], a [[pelvic curtain]], the [[brown belt|same belt]] with the [[Cross of Prontera]], [[black thighhighs]], and [[armored boots]].


h4. Second Costume
* !post #7306146
* !post #7306147
Males and females wear nearly the same costume of a [[breastplate]]/[[boobplate]] with a [[cross]], [[pauldrons]], [[gauntlets]], a [[red cape]], a [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]] [[black shirt]] with [[black gloves]], a [[red tabard]], [[armored boots]], and then either [[black pants]] or a [[black skirt]] with [[black thighhighs]].

title: creator_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The transcendent version of the [[Alchemist (ragnarok online)|]] from [[Ragnarok Online]], localized as Biochemist on the international server. Usually are seen equipped with [[holding axe|axes]] or [[holding staff|staffs]]. Named characters: [[Flamel Emure]]

Males wear a [[living clothes|living]] [[brown cape]] that has [[teeth]], a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[white shirt]], [[white gloves]], a [[brown belt]] with a [[belt pouch|pouch]], [[fur-trimmed pants|fur-trimmed]] [[brown pants]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[shoes]]. 
Females wear a [[living clothes|living]] [[red cape]], a [[short dress|short]] and [[strapless dress]] [[brown dress]] with a [[plunging neckline]], [[white gloves]], and [[fur-trimmed footwear|fur-trimmed]] [[brown footwear|brown]] [[boots]].

h4. Appearance
* !post #7298153
* !post #7298154

title: champion_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The transcendent version of the [[Monk (ragnarok online)|]] from [[Ragnarok Online]]. Mostly fight with their [[clenched hands|fists]] or [[prayer beads]]. Named characters: [[Chen Lio]]

Males wear a [[sleeveless coat|sleeveless]] [[red coat|red]] [[two-tone coat|and]] [[white coat]] with a [[gold trim]] and a [[hooded coat|hood]], a [[championship belt]], [[black gloves|black]] [[two-tone gloves|and]] [[white gloves]], [[black pants]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[shoes]]. 
Females wear a similar outfit but with [[red gloves|red]] [[two-tone gloves|and]] [[white gloves]] and a [[red shirt]].

h4. Appearance
* !post #7298105
* !post #7298109

title: stalker_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The transcendent version of the [[Rogue (ragnarok online)|]] from [[Ragnarok Online]], originally named Chaser on the Japanese and Korean servers but the international name is preferred. Usually have a [[holding dagger|dagger]] of some kind but can also use [[holding bow (weapon)|bows]]. Named characters: [[Gertie Wie]]

Males wear an [[cropped jacket|cropped]] [[fur-trimmed jacket|fur-trimmed]] [[blue jacket]] [[open jacket|openned]] in the middle, a [[short sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[black shirt|black]] [[crop top]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[black gloves]] with [[vambraces]], a [[fur-trimmed cape|fur-trimmed]] [[blue cape|blue]] [[waist cape]], [[brown pants]], and [[armored boots]]. 
Females wear a [[black tank top]] with a [[stomach cutout]], [[fur-trimmed sleeves|fur-trimmed]] [[blue sleeves|blue]] [[detached sleeves|sleeves]], [[black shorts|black]] [[short shorts]], the same waist cape, and [[black footwear|black]] [[high heels]].

h4. Appearance
* !post #7298125
* !post #7298127

title: gypsy_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The transcendent version of the [[Dancer (ragnarok online)|]] from [[Ragnarok Online]]. Only females can become Gypsies. Can be equipped with [[holding bow (weapon)|bows]], but more commonly are seen with a [[holding whip|whip]]. Named characters: [[Trentini]]

They wear a [[strapless bikini|strapless]] [[yellow bikini]], [[detached sleeves|detached]] [[red sleeves]], a [[gold necklace]] with a [[green gemstone|variety]] [[red gemstone|of]] [[blue gemstone|colored]] [[gem]]s, [[see-through pants|see-through]] [[white pants|white]] [[harem pants]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[sandals]]. 

h4. Appearance
* !post #7298093

title: clown_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The transcendent version of the [[Bard (ragnarok online)|]] from [[Ragnarok Online]], localized as Minstrel on the international server. Only males can become Clowns. Can be equipped with [[holding bow (weapon)|bows]], but more commonly are seen with various [[holding instrument|instruments]] such as [[lute (instrument)|]]s or [[guitar]]s. Named characters: [[Alphoccio Basil]]

They wear a [[sleeveless coat|sleeveless]] [[brown coat]] over a [[collared shirt|collared]] [[white shirt]] with [[long sleeves]], [[baggy pants|baggy]] [[purple pants|purple]] [[two-tone pants|and]] [[brown pants]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[boots]]. A very common headwear for them is a [[multicolored headwear|multicolored]] [[jester cap]].

h4. Appearance
* !post #7298090

title: professor_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The transcendent version of the [[Sage (ragnarok online)|]] from [[Ragnarok Online]], localized as Scholar on the international server. Can equip a [[holding staff|staff]] or a [[holding wand|wand]], but sometimes are seen with a [[holding book|book]]. Named characters: [[Celia Alde]]

Males wear a [[fox]] [[animal around neck|around their necks]], a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[red shirt]], [[yellow sleeves|yellow]] and [[white sleeves|white]] [[striped sleeves|striped]] [[detached sleeves]] fastened with a [[bangle]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[brown gloves]], [[white pants]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[shoes]].
Females wear the same fox, a [[sleeveless dress|sleeveless]] [[red dress]] with a [[pelvic curtain]], [[yellow sleeves|yellow]] and [[red sleeves|red]] [[striped sleeves|striped]] [[detached sleeves]] fastened with a [[bangle]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[high heels]]. 

h4. Appearance
* !post #7298073
* !post #7298074

title: paladin_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The transcendent version of the [[Crusader (ragnarok online)|]] from [[Ragnarok Online]]. Can ride a [[Peco Peco]] but not very often. Can use [[holding polearm|polearms]] like [[spear]]s and [[lance]]s or [[holding sword|swords]]. Named characters: [[Randel Lawrence]]

Males wear a [[breastplate]] with a [[cross]], a [[blue cape]], [[pauldrons]] with the [[Cross of Prontera]], [[gauntlets]], a [[black belt]], [[leg armor]], and [[armored boots]].
Females wear a [[crop top|cropped]] [[boobplate]] with a [[cross necklace]], a [[blue cape]], [[pauldrons]] with the [[Cross of Prontera]], [[gauntlets]], a [[brown skirt]] under a [[brown cape|brown]] [[waist cape]], a [[black belt]], [[black thighhighs]], and [[armored boots]].

title: assassin_cross_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The transcendent version of the [[Assassin (ragnarok online)|]] from [[Ragnarok Online]]. Always have a [[holding dagger|dagger]] of some kind, usually a [[jamadhar]]. Named characters: [[Eremes Guile]], [[Shy (ragnarok online)|]]

Males wear a [[torn scarf|torn]] [[red scarf]], [[black shirt]], [[pauldrons]], [[vambraces]], [[black pants]], a [[torn cape|torn]] [[black cape|black]] [[waist cape]] with a [[skull]], and [[armored boots]].
Females wear a fairly [[revealing clothes|revealing]] [[black leotard]] with [[pauldrons]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[black gloves|black]] [[elbow gloves]] with [[vambraces]], [[black thighhighs]], and [[armored boots|armored]] [[high heel boots]].

title: whitesmith_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The transcendent version of the [[Blacksmith (ragnarok online)|]] from [[Ragnarok Online]], localized as Mastersmith on the international server. Usually are equipped with [[holding axe|axes]] or [[holding hammer|hammers]]. Named characters: [[Howard Alt-eisen]]

Males wear a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[white shirt|white]] [[crop top]] with a [[fur-trimmed shirt|fur trim]] and [[open shirt|open]] in the center, a [[black belt]] with a [[belt pouch]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[black gloves]] protected by [[vambraces]], [[suspenders]] holding up [[blue pants]] with a [[fur-trimmed pants|fur trim]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]]. 
Females wear a [[white bikini|white]] [[bikini top only|bikini top]], the same gloves, a [[star (symbol)|star]] [[belt buckle]], [[blue shorts|blue]] [[short shorts]] with a [[fur-trimmed shorts|fur trim]], a [[brown belt]] with a [[belt pouch|pouch]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[boots]].

title: sniper_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The transcendent version of the [[Hunter (ragnarok online)|]] from [[Ragnarok Online]]. Always have a [[holding bow (weapon)|bow]] and [[arrow (projectile)|arrows]], usually in a [[quiver]]. Can be accompanied by a [[wolf]] or [[hawk]]. Named characters: [[Cecil Damon]]

Males wear a [[yellow shirt|yellow]]  [[two-tone shirt|and]] [[brown shirt|brown]] [[crop top]] with a [[fur-trimmed shirt|fur trim]] instead of [[sleeveless shirt|sleeves]], [[yellow gloves|yellow]]  [[two-tone gloves|and]] [[brown gloves|brown]] [[fingerless gloves]] also with a [[fur-trimmed gloves|fur trim]], an [[armband]], [[fur-trimmed shorts|fur-trimmed]] [[brown shorts]] [[pants under shorts|over]] [[grey pants]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]].
Females wear a similar outfit but with more [[midriff]] and [[navel]], and [[yellow shorts|yellow]]  [[two-tone shorts|and]] [[brown shorts]] instead of pants.

body:

Males wear a [[fur-trimmed capelet|fur-trimmed]] [[red capelet]] with a [[high collar]], [[brown wings]], a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[white shirt]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[white gloves]], [[white pants]], and [[white footwear|white]] [[shoes]].
Females wear a [[fur-trimmed cape|fur-trimmed]] [[brown cape]], a [[brown dress|brown]] [[two-tone dress|and]] [[white dress|white]] [[layered dress|layered]] [[short dress]] with [[strapless dress|no straps]], [[fur-trimmed gloves|fur-trimmed]] [[brown gloves]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[two-tone dress|and]] [[white footwear|white]] [[boots]].

title: lord_knight_(ragnarok_online)
body:
The transcendent version of the [[Knight (ragnarok online)|]] from [[Ragnarok Online]]. Mostly use [[holding sword|swords]] but can use other weapons. Very often [[riding bird|riding]] a [[Peco Peco]]. Named characters: [[Seyren Windsor]], [[Deranged Adventurer]], [[Spica Parfait]]

Males wear a [[breastplate]] over [[chainmail]], [[pauldrons]] with a [[cross]], a [[red cape]], [[spiked gauntlets]], a [[black tabard]], a [[black belt]] fastened with the [[Cross of Prontera]], [[leg armor]], and [[armored boots]].
Females wear a [[boobplate]] with a [[cross]], [[pauldrons]], [[spiked gauntlets]], a [[black belt]] fastened with the [[Cross of Prontera]], a [[pink skirt|pink]] [[miniskirt]], [[black thighhighs]], and [[armored boots]].

title: monk_(ragnarok_online)
body:
One of the possible 2nd jobs of the [[Acolyte (ragnarok online)|]] in [[Ragnarok Online]]. Mostly fight with their [[clenched hands|fists]] or [[prayer beads]].

Males wear a [[red coat|red]], [[white coat|white]], and [[black coat|black]] [[multicolored coat]] with a [[gold trim]] and a [[hooded coat|hood]] and [[short sleeves]], a [[championship belt]], [[black pants]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[shoes]]. 
Females wear an [[short sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[open coat|open]] [[white coat|white]] [[two-tone coat|and]] [[red coat]] with a [[hooded coat|hood]], a [[black shirt]], [[black shorts]], a [[rope belt]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]].

body:

Males wear an [[short sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[open jacket|open]] [[yellow jacket]] with a [[tiger print|tiger]] [[print jacket|print]] and a [[fur-trimmed jacket|fur trim]], [[spiked bracelet]]s, [[fur-trimmed pants|fur-trimmed]] [[brown pants]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]]. 
Females wear a [[short sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[open coat|open]] [[red coat]] with a [[fur-trimmed coat|fur trim]], a [[black bra]], [[black shorts|black]] [[short shorts]] with a [[fur-trimmed shorts|fur trim]], [[fishnet pantyhose]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]].

Males wear a [[short sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[grey shirt]] with a [[chest guard]], [[brown pants]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[boots]].

title: conical_hat
body:
A [[hat]], typically [[tall hat|tall]] and narrow, with a [[cone (geometry)|conical]] shape and no brim.

Not to be confused with a [[rice hat]], which is (generally) a low, wide cone.

title: sonic_the_hedgehog_(satam)
body:
[b]Sonic the Hedgehog[/b] is an American-Italian animated television series created by DiC Entertainment and the Italian studio Reteitalia, in association with Telecinco. The series contrasts with [[Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog]], which premiered on the same year, for featuring darker stories and elements. Also know by the fans as [b]Sonic SatAM[/b] to differentiate it from other series, because it was a Saturday morning cartoon. The series and characters would later be incorporated into [[Sonic the Hedgehog (Archie Comics)|Sonic's long-time running]] [[Archie Comics]] series.

h4. Characters
* [[Sonic the Hedgehog]]
* [[Sally Acorn]]
* [[Bunnie Rabbot]]
* [[Antoine D'Coolette]]
* [[Rotor the Walrus]]
* [[Tails (Sonic)|]]
* [[Nicole the Holo-Lynx|Nicole]]
* [[Charles the Hedgehog|Uncle Chuck]]
* [[Dr. Eggman|Doctor Robotnik]]
* [[Snively]]
* [[Ixis Naugus]]

h4. External links
* "Sonic News Network: Sonic the Hedgehog (TV series)":[https://sonic.fandom.com/wiki/Sonic_the_Hedgehog_(TV_series)]
* "Wikipedia: Sonic the Hedgehog (TV series)":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sonic_the_Hedgehog_(TV_series)]

title: lysander_(the_citadel)
body: The Angel of Envy: He made people who were forced to live at the bottom climb up again.

title: comedian_(artwork)
body:
A 2019 artwork by Italian artist Maurizio Cattelan. The work consists of a [[banana]] [[duct tape]]d to a wall.

Three pieces were produced, two of which were sold for $120,000 each. One of the pieces was eaten by a performance artist while it was still on display after being sold. The work received significant attention due to the nature of the work and how much it sold for.

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Comedian (artwork)":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comedian_(artwork)]
* "Know Your Meme: Duct Tape Banana":[https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/events/duct-tape-banana]
other_names: コメディアン(カテラン)

title: missing_poster
body:
A [[poster (object)|poster]] indicating that a person, animal, or object has gone missing. 

A missing poster typically includes a reference picture and the word "MISSING", or other text asking about the whereabouts of the subject. Additional information and/or a [[phone number]] can sometimes also be listed.

title: kyubey
body:
Also known by [i]QB[/i], Kyubey is one of the main characters [spoiler]and later revealed as the main antagonist[/spoiler] from [[Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica]].

They are a "Messenger of Magic" (魔法の使者 mahou no shisha) who grants the wishes of young girls, but in exchange contracts their services as Puella Magi (魔法少女, mahou shoujo, lit. Magical Girls). Girls who form a contract with them are tasked to defeat [[Witch (madoka magica)|]]es -- bizarre entities that feed upon the hopes and dreams of normal people.

[spoiler]However, unbeknownst to the Magical Girls, Witches were actually a corrupted form of Magical Girls who were either killed in battle or eventually have their [[Soul Gem]] tainted over time and transforms into [[Grief Seed]] after consecutive encounters with Witches. Kyubey intentionally withheld this specific detail to create a millennia of cycle of war between Magical Girls and Witches in order to harvest the magical energy of these clashes for the benefit of their race. Their indifference to death and suffering upon the revelation of this fact upon [[Kaname Madoka]] has led to fans creating numerous hate arts subjecting them to various physical abuses.[/spoiler]

Kyubey is a four legged, white, fox-like [[alien]] with round [[red eyes]], and the unchanging facial expression [[:3|/人◕ ‿‿ ◕人\]]. Appearance and name share an affinity with [[kyuubi]].

Voiced by [[Katou Emiri]] (Japanese) / [[Cassandra Lee Morris]] (English).

h4. See also
* [[Juubey (Madoka Magica)|]] ([[Mahou Shoujo Kazumi Magica|Kazumi Magica]]-only member of the species)
* [[Small Kyubey]] ([[Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica Gaiden|Magia Record]]-only member of the species)

h4. External links

* "Puella Magi Wiki: Kyuubey":[http://wiki.puella-magi.net/Kyuubey]

title: gwen_tennyson_(future)
body:
Gwendolyn Tennyson is the future incarnation of [[Gwen Tennyson]] from the [[2005_(style)|2005]] [[Cartoon Network]] animated series [[Ben 10]].

Appearing in the third season episode "Ben 10,000", Gwendolyn is introduced as a hooded sorceress who appeared before 10-year-olds Ben and Gwen Tennyson and took them both to a far-flung future where aliens co-exists with mankind and [[Ben Tennyson]] became a celebrity hero with complete mastery over the Omnitrix and its (at the time) unlocked 10,000 alien forms.

In this future, Gwen have mastered the many mythical arts of Bezel and all of its secrets, now taking up her full name of "[[gwen_tennyson_(future)|Gwendolyn Tennyson]]" as she protects the rest of the world in Ben's place whenever he's off-world doing his hero business.

In the episode "Ben 10,000" , Gwendolyn had [[short hair|short]] [[red hair]] styled into a [[pixie cut]]. She wore a [[blue bodysuit|blue]] and [[black bodysuit|black]] [[spandex|spandex suit]] with black [[combat boots]] and the "Charms of Bezel"  on her right arm. She had a [[hood]] and only sometimes wore it. She had a [[belt]] with a cat logo on it, the same cat logo Gwen wore on her shirt when she was 10-years-old.

In the fourth season episode "Ken 10" , Gwendolyn had much [[very long hair|longer hair]], tied back in a [[high ponytail]] and her black combat boots are now [[high heels]].

title: bishoujo_senshi_sailor_moon
body:
Officially translated as [i]Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon[/i], it is the title of a franchise created by [[Takeuchi Naoko]]. It is generally credited with popularizing the concept of sentai [[magical girl]]s called [[Sailor Senshi]].

The Sailor Moon manga was preceded by [[Codename wa Sailor V]], which centered around just one girl. Popular spinoffs are the [[Sailor Moon Musical]]s which are theater productions and [[Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon]], a live-action take on the series.

The series is broken into five distinct seasons:

* [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon (first season)]] (Dark Kingdom arc)
* [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon R]] (Black Moon arc)
* [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon S]] (Infinity arc)
* [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon SuperS]] (Dream arc)
* [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon Stars]] (Stars arc)

h4. See also

* [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon Crystal]]
* [[List of Sailor Moon characters]]
other_names: 美少女戦士セーラームーン

It consists of a [[short dress|short]] [[black dress|black]] [[sleeveless dress|sleeveless]] [[frilled dress]] with [[center frills]] and [[long sleeves|long]] [[black sleeves|black]] [[detached sleeves]] a [[black ribbon|black]] [[thigh ribbon]] forming a [[thigh strap]] and a [[single ankle cuff]]. She is [[barefoot]] in this costume.

title: owl_of_athena
body:
In Greek mythology, a little owl (Athene noctua) traditionally represents or accompanies Athena, the virgin goddess of wisdom, or Minerva, her incarnation in Roman mythology. Because of such association, the bird— often referred to as the "owl of Athena" or the "owl of Minerva"—has been used as a symbol of knowledge, wisdom, perspicacity and erudition throughout the Western world.

h4. External links:
* "Wikipedia - Owl of Athena":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Owl_of_Athena]

title: surtr_(arknights)
body:
[i]Rhodes Island Guard Operator Surtr, a person difficult to approach.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [[Arknights]]. She also appears as a Caster Operator in [[Arknights: Endfield]]

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Unknown[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]January 22[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Sarkaz[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]162 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]2 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A mysterious amnesiac Sarkaz girl undergoing treatment at Rhodes Island after being encountered in a Catastophe-stricken town. During testing, she displayed an inexplicably high combat prowess, and was quickly drafted as a combat operator. 

Apparently likes ice cream.

Her ability to harness flames, the broadsword-wielding molten giant accompanying her, and one of her skills aptly named [i]Laevatain[/i] are all homages to the Norse being of the same name.

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Horie Yui]] (Japanese), Yunhezui (Chinese), [[Kira Buckland]] (English), and Seo Yu-ri (Korean). Her art designer is [[ask (askzy)|]].

h4. Skins

* !post #4117243: Elite II
* !post #4556350: [[surtr (liberte echec) (arknights)|Liberté//Échec]]

title: sallie_(kureiji_ollie)
body:
Similar to [[Olivia (kureiji ollie)|]], Sallie is an [[alternate universe]] version of [[Kureiji Ollie]] who is a well-endowed 32-year-old zombie bachelorette.

h4. Appearance

* !post #6481240: Profile

title: kureiji_ollie_(rebirth)
body:
The 6th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive Indonesia|hololive ID]]'s [[Kureiji Ollie]], first shown on her "2024 birthday live":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O607BZ8HwDk].

It is a [[white dress]] with a [[white cape|matching]] floor-length [[cape]], [[wide sleeves|wide]] [[detached sleeves]] reaching [[sleeves past fingers|past her hands]], a [[bone]] trim and [[red ribbon]]s on the skirt. She also wears [[Udin (kureiji ollie)|]] [[earrings]], [[high heels]] made of [[bone]] and a bone [[halo]] accessory with an Udin chained to each side.

Her [[official alternate hairstyle|hairstyle]] for this costume is a pair of [[very long hair|very long]] [[twintails]] with [[black ribbon]]s, with the ends tied into [[twin drills|drills]] similar to her [[kureiji ollie (mafia princess)|third outfit]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #8285414: Reference sheet
* !post #8286740: Merchandise

title: kureiji_ollie_(5th_costume)
body:
The 5th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[Hololive Indonesia|hololive ID]]'s [[Kureiji Ollie]].

It is [[otaku]]-themed, consisting of a [[pink scarf]] and [[blue jacket|blue]] [[happi]] adorned with the [[hololive]] logo, [[Yagoo]]'s face and a [[floral print]], over a shirt depicting Ollie in a [[maid]] outfit with [[fake animal ears|fake]] [[bear ears]] and [[paw gloves]] matching [[Udin (kureiji ollie)|]]'s, [[black pants|black]] [[yoga pants]] and [[red sneakers]]. She also wears [[ring]]s on all of her fingers, a [[white headband]], [[earrings]] based on the Hololive logo and has a [[heart tattoo]] under her right eye.

Her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] consists of [[twintails]] with [[penlight (glowstick)|]]s [[hair ornament|embedded throughout]] and an [[ahoge]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #8041778: Profile

title: kureiji_ollie_(new_year)
body:
The 4th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive Indonesia|hololive ID]]'s [[Kureiji Ollie]].

It's a [[ninja]]-inspired outfit consisting of a [[metal collar]], a [[black kimono]] with a [[single sleeve|single]] [[wide sleeves|wide sleeve]] which she wears [[off shoulder]], a [[black tank top]] with a [[cleavage cutout]], [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[black gloves]], a black [[obi]], a [[grey tabard|grey]] [[tabard]] with [[tassel]]s, [[black pants|black]] [[black hakama|hakama]] [[hakama pants|pants]] with [[hip vent]]s and [[black sandals|black]] [[okobo]]. She also carries a pair of [[katana]].

She has 2 different [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyles]] in this costume:
* [[short hair|Short]] [[wavy hair]] with an [[ahoge]], [[long bangs|long]] [[asymmetrical bangs]] [[hair over one eye|covering her left eye]] and decorated with a [[forehead protector]]
* [[Very long hair]] with [[low-tied sidelocks]] and a [[side ponytail]] held with a [[black bow|black]] [[hair bow]]

* !post #7449049: Profile

title: kureiji_ollie_(indonesian_dress)
body:
The 2nd [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive Indonesia|hololive ID]]'s [[Kureiji Ollie]].

It is based on traditional [[indonesian clothes|Indonesian]] (more specifically Javanese) [[bride|bridal]] attire, which consists of a [[sleeveless]] [[red shirt|red top]] with a [[lace]] collar (although its often depicted as a separate [[red tube top|red]] [[tube top]] and [[detached collar|collar]]), a black underbust, a gold [[necklace]], lace [[armband]]s or [[armlet]]s, a [[black shawl]] or [[black sleeves|black]] [[wide sleeves|wide]] [[detached sleeves]] with [[tassel]]s and a [[bear print]] depicting Udin, a [[black skirt|black]] [[miniskirt]] with a golden [[striped skirt|stripe pattern]] and matching shoes this time. The bandages on her leg are also black now.

Her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] is [[very long hair|very long]] [[hair down]] with [[blunt bangs]], a [[tiara]], a [[heart hair ornament]], a traditional [[suntiang]] [[headdress]] and a smaller bow.

h4. Appearance

title: azure_striker_gunvolt
body:
[b][i]Azure Striker Gunvolt[/i][/b] (Japanese title: 蒼き雷霆ガンヴォルト, pronounced as アームドブルー・ガンヴォルト, Armed Blue Gunvolt) is an action side-scrolling platforming series developed by "Inti Creates":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inti_Creates with some input from "Keiji Inafune":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Keiji_Inafune, and it is Inti Creates' first independent video game series. The series serves as a spiritual successor to the [[Mega Man Zero (series)|]] series. The series started with [i][[Azure Striker Gunvolt 1]][/i], and follows the titular [[Gunvolt]].

The series later gained a sequel, [i][[Azure Striker Gunvolt 2]][/i], which takes place a few months after the events of its predecessor, where Gunvolt crosses paths with an Adapt-hunting avenger named [[Copen (gunvolt)|]] (EN) / Acura (JP) from the previous game as they encounter a group of Adapts known as Eden, whom harbor a hatred towards humans, seeking to use Joule's powers to wipe out humans and create a new utopia for Adapts. A gaiden game, [i][[gunvolt chronicles luminous avenger ix|Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX]][/i], later follows after the events of [i]Azure Striker Gunvolt 1[/i] and focuses on Copen. There are also supplementary materials that expands on the serie's world and characters, such as [i]Azure Striker Gunvolt: Fleeting Memories[/i], prequel story taking place before the first game, as well as an OVA based on the first game released through the Nintendo 3DS eShop. Gunvolt also made an appearance in [i][[Mighty Gunvolt]][/i], a retro-inspired spin-off series of games also from Inti Creates that features a cross-over of [i]Azure Striker Gunvolt[/i], [i][[Mighty No. 9]][/i], and [i][[gal gun|Gal☆Gun]][/i]. The series gains a third game in [i][[Azure Striker Gunvolt 3]][/i], set years after the events of [i]Azure Striker Gunvolt 2[/i].

h4. Characters

h5. Main characters

* [[Gunvolt]]
* [[Joule (gunvolt)|Cyan (JP) / Joule (EN)]]
* [[Lumen (gunvolt)|Morpho (JP) / Lumen (EN)]]
* [[Acura (gunvolt)|]]

h5. QUILL / FEATHER

* [[Asimov (gunvolt)|]]
* [[Gino (gunvolt)|]]
* [[Monica (gunvolt)|]]

h5. Sumuragi Group

* [[Shiden (gunvolt)|]]
* [[Daytona (gunvolt)|]]
* [[Elise (gunvolt)|]]
* [[Stratos (gunvolt)|]]
* [[Merak (gunvolt)|]]
* [[Jota (gunvolt)|Iota (JP) / Jota (EN)]]
* [[Carrera (gunvolt)|]]
* [[Pantera (gunvolt)|]]
* [[Zonda (gunvolt)|]]

h5. GV2

h5. GV3

h4. See also

* [i][[Mighty No. 9]][/i], a spiritual successor to the classic [i][[mega man (classic)|Rockman]][/i] series by Keiji Inafune and co-developed by Inti Creates
* [i][[Mighty Gunvolt]][/i] and [i][[Mighty Gunvolt Burst]][/i], a spin-off series also featuring Gunvolt, Beck from [i]Mighty No. 9[/i], and Ekoro from [i]Gal☆Gun[/i]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia article":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Azure_Striker_Gunvolt]
* "Official website (English)":[http://www.gunvolt.com/en/]

title: family_crest
body:
A [[crest]] used as a symbol of various clans/families in Japan. Especially one with considerable amount of influence within their region or the entire country. Also referred outside of Japan as "mon" (紋), though the word [i]mon[/i] is used to refer to any crest in general in Japan.

h4. Japanese family crests (kamon)

* !asset #20257814: [[Kikumon]], crest of the Imperial family of Japan
* !asset #20634855: [[kirimon (paulownia)|Kirimon]], crest of the Toyotomi clan, now the government seal of Japan
* !asset #20258334: [[mitsuba aoi (tokugawa mon)|Mitsuba Aoi]], crest of the Tokugawa clan
* !asset #20258593: [[Oda Uri]], crest of the Oda clan
* !asset #20258893: [[Mitsu Uroko]], crest of the Hojo clan
* !asset #20258790: [[Yotsuwari-bishi]], crest of the Takeda clan, also known as Takeda-bishi
* !asset #20257911: [[sanada clan (emblem)|Mutsurensen]], crest of the Sanada clan

h4. See also

* [[Heraldry]] - European counterpart of family crest
* "Wikipedia - Mon":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mon_(emblem)

title: ame-chan_(emo)_(needy_girl_overdose)
body:
Consolidated tag for a very specific outfit of Ame-chan from Needy Girl Overdose. 
The outfit consists of her pigtails bound by red ties, a white x ornament for the bangs, a black choker, a white chain necklace looping from the front and the back of the choker (and draping around the shoulder), a black short-sleeve sweater with a skeleton print, one black arm warmer and one red-black-white plaid arm warmer (both attached to the main sweater by a single black belt), a red-black-white plaid skirt, and a pair of high black multi-belted boots. 
Artists will also sometimes include makeup (such as dark pink eyeshadow) or drawn red devil horns, X over the eyes, low wings, and cellphone with bunny ears. Images do not need to fit every single criteria to be here, but should still include the main articles of clothing, i.e. the pigtails, sweater, arm warmers, plaid skirt, and boots. This is assuming that the image isn't not a fullbody, which will automatically exclude part of the outfit by means of cropping.

Example of fitting all criteria:

* !post #9017621: This includes all described articles of clothing in the first paragraph.

Examples of fitting most criteria:

* !post #7104381: You can't see the other red-black-white plaid arm warmer or the skeleton print in the way that Ame is angled.
* !post #8737676: You can't see the skeleton print in the way that Ame is angled.

Examples of cropped images that should still be tagged like this:

* !post #7104363: Torso-up.
* !post #8032970: Also a torso-up image.

title: kamen_rider_zero-two
body:
The final form of [[Kamen Rider Zero-One|Zero-One]] accessed by using the Zero-Two Progrisekey in Hiden Zero-Two Driver.

It is also the first Kamen Rider final form that can be counted as a separate Rider since previous final forms are basically extensions of the same Rider. 

Zero-Two is a homage to [[Kamen Rider 2]], due to having similar names, [[red gloves]], and heavier silver accents.
other_names: 仮面ライダーゼロツー

title: skyrider
body:
Protagonist of the sixth entry in the [[Kamen Rider]] franchise, [[New Kamen Rider]].

Hiroshi Tsukuba is severely wounded by a mutant monster of the organization Neo-Shocker. A kidnapped scientist convinces his captors that he can make Tsukuba of use to them by surgically altering him into their cyborg slave. With the intention of turning against Neo-Shocker, the scientist uses this chance to save Tsukuba's life, turning him into Kamen Rider.

Later he is given the name "Skyrider" by his predecessors to avoid confusion with [[kamen rider 1|No. 1]] and [[kamen rider 2|No. 2]].

Skyrider is mostly bright green in color with a brown chestplate and the first rider capable of flight.

title: kamen_rider_black_rx
body:
Hero of [[Kamen Rider BLACK RX (series)|]], a child of the sun.

Black RX is the result of [[Minami Koutarou]]'s Kingstone mutating from exposure to solar radiation after being thrown into space. With his new powers, he returns to Earth to put an end to the Crisis Empire.

RX retains the grasshopper motif and is now colored black and green. His new powers allow him to switch between the yellow [[Roborider]] and blue [[Biorider]].

h4. See also

* [[Kamen Rider BLACK (series)|]]
** [[Kamen Rider BLACK|Kamen Rider BLACK (Character)]]
* [[Revolcane]]

title: idolmaster_million_live!_theater_days
body:
A mobile idol-raising simulator and rhythm game with communication events featuring idols and some cards from [[Idolmaster Million Live!]]. Idols are sorted into Princess, Fairy, or Angel categories.

Two new idols have been introduced at 765 Pro: [[Shiraishi Tsumugi]] and [[Sakuramori Kaori]]. [[Aoba Misaki]] is also introduced as a second secretary.

It also brings in guest idols like [[Leon_(idolmaster)|]] and [[Shiika_(idolmaster)|]].

See [[Idolmaster Million Live!]] for the list of everyone in Theater Days.

h4. See also

* [[List of costumes from Idolmaster Million Live! Theater Days]]

h4. External links

* "Official Site":https://millionlive.idolmaster.jp/theaterdays/
other_names: アイドルマスターミリオンライブ!シアターデイズ

title: kamen_rider_v3
body:
Protagonist of the [[kamen rider v3 (series)|second television series]] in the [[Kamen Rider]] franchise.

To avenge his slain family, Shirou Kazami asks Kamen Riders [[kamen rider 1|No. 1]] and [[kamen rider 2|No. 2]]  to alter him into a cyborg. Though reluctant at first, the Riders grant his request. With a worthy successor, the Riders depart, leaving Kamen Rider V3 to defend Japan and bring down the organization responsible for his family's murder, Destron.

V3 is distinguished by his red helmet with green compound eyes, white scarf, and green body suit. He is modeled after a dragonfly.

title: plump
body:
Slightly chubby, but not enough to be [[fat]]. A saying that goes around for plump is "Fat in all the right places".

The Japanese tags above are Pixiv's equivalent of the word, but be aware that not all Pixiv-centric uses of those tags fit Danbooru's definition. As with all other size-specific tags, observe the body and see if the tag actually needs to be used before adding it; make sure that the body is not simply “[[curvy]]” and that it’s not “[[fat]]”, either. 

Plump is mutually exclusive with [[fat]] and [[obese]].

title: german_shepherd
body:
The German Shepherd, also known in Britain as an Alsatian, is a German breed of working [[dog]] of medium to large size. The breed was developed by Max von Stephanitz using various traditional German herding dogs from 1899.
 The ears are rather large and stand erect. The back is level and muscular, and the tail is bushy and curves downward. The coat is thick and rough and may be black, tan, black and tan or gray. The coat should be harsh and of medium length; however, long-coated individuals occur often.

The breed is commonly used by [[military]], [[police]] and emergency services for [[K9 (dog)|]].
other_names: ジャーマンシェパード

title: yakumo_beni_(2nd_costume)
body:
The 2nd [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[VSPO!]]'s [[Yakumo Beni]].

In this costume, she wears a [[fake animal ears|false]] [[rabbit ears]] a [[black dress]] with a [[cleavage cutout]] revealing a [[black bra]], a short [[red necktie]], [[black pantyhose]] and [[black footwear|black]] [[high heels|high-heeled]] [[shoes]] and [[white wrist cuffs]].

For her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] in this costume, she has her [[long hair]] tied into [[twintails]] held with a [[black ribbon|black]] [[hair ribbon]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #5256375: Profile
* !post #5273357: Merchandise

h4. External links

* "Costume reveal stream":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fzi-dc5t2Q4

title: ines_(arknights)
body:
[i]Ines's past is unimportant. Anyway, she wishes to say, 'It's been a while.'[/i]

A playable Vanguard Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Kazdel[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]February 19th[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Undisclosed[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]168 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]19 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A mercenary throughout Kazdel's civil war, Ines worked closely with [[hoederer_(arknights)|Hoederer]] and [[w_(arknights)|W]] before joining Rhodes Island during the events of Episode 12. She is a major supporting character in [i]Darknights Memoir[/i] and [i]Episode 12: All Quiet Under the Thunder[/i].

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Tsunematsu Ayumi]] (Japanese), Zhang Ruoyu (Chinese), Erica Lindbeck (English), and Shin Na-ri (Korean). Her original NPC sprite was drawn by [[Liduke]], while her current art designer is [[eboda-x]].

h4. Skins

title: hero_(dq11)
body:
The protagonist of [i][[Dragon Quest XI]][/i]. A young man who is known to be the Luminary, a legendary hero who can save the world. He is imprisoned and accused of being the harbinger of evil, prompting his quest.

For the sake of convenience, his default name is [b]"Eleven"[/b]. He can also be refered to as [b]the Luminary[/b].

[spoiler]By the end, he's given the title of Roto/Erdrick, the implication being that his game is a distant prequel to [i][[Dragon Quest III]][/i], although how distant (or if there is any connection at all) is debatable.[/spoiler]

Him, along with the heroes of [i][[roto (dq3)|III]][/i], [i][[hero_(dq4)|IV]][/i], and [i][[hero_(dq8)|VIII]][/i], were chosen to be fighters on [[super_smash_bros.|Super Smash Bros. Ultimate]]'s first fighters pass. They are collectively Fighter #72, with Eleven as the "face".
